title: Mac Client crashes when starting to load into the in game client with someone else.
body: Playing on a mac, whenever I try to play with a friend and we start to load into the game, the in game client bug splats. Every attempt to reconnect is an immediate bug splat. I can play solo games just fine. I have repaired the client etc. Please help

replies.body:
Since you're able to play solo matches fine, but every time you try to play with friends your client always crashes, it sounds like something might be blocking your network from connecting to our game servers. 

Take a look over our [**connection faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure that your network can get a smooth link with our servers, and let me know if you have any issues along the way.

None of the troubleshooting has helped, all my ports are set correctly I bought a nighthawk router and had my ISP optimize my ports for league, firewall is off for league, OS for my mac is up to date, this latest patch has caused me to be unable to play with any friends without immediate bug splat in any game mode including customs. I repaired client as well to no avail. Please help :(

It definitely sounds like you've hit most of the common causes, so let's get you a little more one on one help from our tech guys. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a much closer look and get you back on the Rift!
